summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Plat 13W, Page 57 of the Official Zoning Map to rezone certain property in Blocks 78-81, 113, 114 and 128, supplemental plat of West Woodland Park Addition along the West Side of Phinney Ave. N. between N. 58th and N. 59th Streets and along both sides of Phinney Ave. N. between N. 59th St. and a point 100 feet north of N. 62nd St. from BC Zone to B1 Zone. (C.F. 287009 - Petition of Laura Barnard, et al.; C.F. 287783 - Petition of Bruce Fine, et al.)
